name: BOXer (Sotong Studio)
description:
Simple Game Jam - Moveable Squares Control :

P1 Control: W A S D ( Move ), V (Attack), B(High Attack)

P2 Control : Arrow ( Move ), O (Attack), P(High Attack)

Combo :

1.  →,  ↑, (High Attack),  (Attack)

2.   →,  ↑,  ↑, ↓,   →, A(Attack), (High Attack)

(Note : This combo still have bug, so please do the input slowly (delay 1s, for try other combo))

We place some combo but this not working as well as number 1 and 2 so try input (Attack) or (High Attack) after the combo input,

3. →, →, (Attack)

4. →, ↑ , →, →, (Attack)

Note :  We make this game in our free time so we don't make good use of the 72 hours provided. We sincerely accept suggestions and comments about this boxing boxing game. Thanks.
